field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #MESSAGE_ID# - message ID #USER_ID# - user ID #USER_LOGIN# - user Login #USER_NAME# - user first name #USER_LAST_NAME# - user last name #FROM_USER_ID# - message sender ID #FROM_USER# - message sender name #DATE_CREATE# - the date the message was created #TITLE# - message title #MESSAGE# - message body #MESSAGE_50# - first 50 characters of the message text #EMAIL_TO# - message recipient e-mail address
